thread.title: IOCL Recruitment 2017 Apply Online (Apprentices - 425 Vacancies)

author: noreply@blogger.com (dinesh prabhu)
title: IOCL Recruitment 2017 Apply Online (Apprentices - 425 Vacancies)

organizations.name: electronics & communication / electronics & telecommunication / electronics & radio communication / instrumentation & control / electronics) of engineering

text:
03 
Age Limit : 18 to 24 Years as on 14th January 2017. 
Consolidated stipend: â‚¹ 7530/- per month shall be payable to the Technician Apprentices. Monthly Stipend shall be based on 90% of the semi-skilled wages of State or Central whichever is higher, for that location. 
Educational Qualifications: 
Technician Apprentice (Mechanical) -> 03 years (or 02 years through lateral entry after ITI of minimum one year duration) full time Diploma in Mechanical Engineering from a Govt. recognized Institute. 
Technician Apprentice (Electrical) -> 03 years (or 02 years through lateral entry after ITI of minimum one year duration) full time Diploma in Electrical Engineering from a Govt. recognized institute. 
Technician Apprentice (Telecommunication & Instrumentation) -> 03 years (or 02 years through lateral entry after ITI of minimum one year duration) full time Diploma in any of the disciplines (Electronics & Communication / Electronics & Telecommunication / Electronics & Radio Communication / Instrumentation & Control / Electronics) of Engineering from a Govt. recognized Institute. 
Selection Process : Written Test and Personal Interview. 
How to Apply : Eligible Interested candidates should visit IOCL Pipelines Website and apply online on or before 13/02/2017 . 
For Queries, if any, may be addressed to the following e-mail ids based on Post Codes under which applied:- 
(a) Post Code NRPL01, NRPL02, NRPL03 : nrpl_appsengage2017@indianoil.in (b) Post Code ERPL01, ERPL02, ERPL03 : erpl_appsengage2017@indianoil.in (c) Post Code WRPL01, WRPL02, WRPL03, WRPL04,WRPL05, WRPL06, WRPL07, WRPL08, WRPL09 : wrpl_appsengage2017@indianoil.in (d) Post Code SRPL01, SRPL02, SRPL03 : srpl_appsengage2017@indianoil.in (e) Post Code SERPL01, SERPL02, SERPL03 : serpl_appsengage2017@indianoil.in
